attributes.action: Events & Entertainment market to be included in Hospitality help during Covid-19
attributes.additional_details:
After 6 months there is still no help for the live events and entertainment industry. It hasn't been included in hospitality which makes up £39billion to our economy. 

Please sign the petition to include events and entertainment industries into hospitality to save the events industry.
